description: Located in the heart of the lower east side Manhattan, you're surrounded by many great restaurants, nightlife and entertainment venues. Our studio is less than 2 minute walk to the F M J trains and 8 minute walk to the B D express station. You can get anywhere you want in the city while saving a lot of time on commute. There are also citibike stations, which are conveniently located around almost every corner. Supermarket and Laundry is right next door.
name: Cozy Lower East Side apt
review: Great location with a lot of restaurants and bars nearby. Check in and check out we're easy and Sam communicated details clearly. It's small, but the apartment was clean-However, wifi was a little spotty. Overall, a great apartment if you are looking for a place to stay for only a few days!
